entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 12:46PM PDT by NWS

entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 03 at 12:15PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: Steady rises on area streams and rivers will continue into the weekend. Showers and thunderstorms on Thursday, along with periods of moderate to heavy rain on Friday, will result in additional opportunities for stream and river rises. Temperatures will be cooling by Saturday, which will slow snow melt, resulting in creek levels beginning a decline into next week.
